item.title: Version 2.1
item.description:
SaneClip 2.1

Improvements

  • Image Thumbnails - Clipboard history now shows visual previews for copied images
  • Image-First Capture - Copying wallpapers and images now captures the image data instead of file paths
  • Reorganized Context Menu - Right-click menu grouped logically: actions, organize, export, delete
  • Onboarding Permission Check - Accessibility permission verified before completing setup
  • Dark Mode Enforced - iOS app now always uses dark mode matching the brand

item.title: Version 2.0
item.description:
SaneClip 2.0 - Cross-Device Sync & Smart Paste

New Features

  • Cross-Device Sync - iCloud sync via CKSyncEngine keeps clipboard history in sync across your Mac and iPhone
  • Smart Paste Modes - Auto-detects code (pastes plain), URLs (strips tracking params), or standard text
  • Paste Stack - Queue multiple items and paste them in FIFO or LIFO order
  • Source-Aware Colors - Color-coded bars show which app each clip came from (12 app colors)
  • iOS Companion App - View, search, and manage clipboard history from your iPhone with Siri Shortcuts and widgets

Improvements

  • Default paste mode setting (Standard, Plain Text, or Smart)
  • URL tracking parameter stripping (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, and more)
  • App Store availability as Universal Purchase (one purchase for Mac + iPhone)

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description:
SaneClip 1.4 - Security Hardening

Security Enhancements

  • Keychain Integration - All secrets (webhook keys, encryption keys) now stored securely in macOS Keychain
  • History Encryption-at-Rest - AES-256-GCM encryption for clipboard history (enabled by default)
  • URL Scheme Confirmation - Destructive commands (copy, paste, clear) require user confirmation
  • HTTPS Enforcement - Webhooks must use HTTPS (localhost exempt for testing)
  • Seamless Migration - Existing plaintext data auto-migrates to encrypted format on first launch

Technical

  • New KeychainHelper with Sendable conformance for secure credential storage
  • New HistoryEncryption service using CryptoKit AES-GCM
  • Enhanced URLSchemeHandler with command parsing and confirmation requirements
  • 47 tests passing (22 new security tests added)

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
SaneClip 1.1 - Phase 1 Polish

New Features

  • First-launch onboarding - Welcome tutorial with permissions setup and keyboard shortcuts guide
  • App source attribution - See which app each clip came from with app icon
  • Excluded apps list - Block sensitive apps (1Password, banking apps) from clipboard capture
  • Duplicate detection - Automatically consolidate identical clips
  • Keyboard navigation - Arrow keys and vim-style j/k navigation in history
  • Paste count badges - Track how many times each item was pasted
  • Menu bar icon options - Choose between List and Minimal icon styles
  • Sound effects toggle - Optional paste confirmation sounds

Improvements

  • Security-by-default - Authentication required to reduce security settings
  • Smarter time display - Compact format (41s, 15m, 2h, 3d)
  • Compact stats - Shows "wd ¬∑ ch" format for word and character counts
  • Aligned metadata - Fixed-width columns for cleaner visual scanning
  • Renamed setting - "Detect & skip passwords" for clarity

Bug Fixes

  • Metadata no longer wraps - Single-line metadata regardless of content length
  • Pinned items now persist - Pinned items survive app restart

UI/UX

  • URL tracking stripping - Auto-removes utm_*, fbclid, gclid from URLs
  • Hover highlighting - Glass material effect with animation on hover
  • Content-type icons - Link, code, or text icons for faster scanning
